long_description: The Paddle Hugger Velcro Paddle Holder mounts to your stand up paddleboard and holds your paddle so you don't have to. Rip-and-stick attachment allows you to remove the Velcro Paddle Holder. Stick to the wall for an easy way to store your paddle when not in use. Package of 2 secures a single paddle. Fits all major brand paddle shafts.
short_description: The Paddle Hugger Velcro Paddle Holder mounts to your stand up paddleboard and holds your paddle so you don't have to.
